comb=
ine Runners, it wasn't end-user extensible in the usual ways.
With the succ=
ess of Rules, I hope to find a good extension hook that
will let us do for =
data-driven tests what Rules have done for fixture
preparation, so that eve=
ryone can drive data through their tests in
their own ways.

Until that hap=
pens, I think that Aviv Ben-Yosef's trick of using the
Enclosed runner is t=
he cleanest way to combine parameterized and
non-parameterized tests:
